email-verification.subject: Please Verify Your Email Address

login.subject: Sign In to Your Account
login.body:
Hello,

You can sign in to your account by clicking the link below. 

{{ url }}

If you did not request a sign-in link or if you have any concerns about your account security, please contact our marketing team.

reset-password.subject: Password Reset Request
reset-password.body:
Hello,

We received a request to reset your password. If you did not make this request, please ignore this email. Otherwise, you can reset your password by clicking the link below:

{{ url }}

If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, please contact our support team.

request-approval.subject: New subscription - {{ requester.name }} need approval
request-approval.body:
Hello,

A new subscription request has been submitted by {{ requester.name }} and requires your approval. Please review the details and take the appropriate action to validate this member account.

Click here to view the member profile:
{{ url }}

user-approved.subject: Your account is approved
user-approved.body:
Hello {{ user.name }},

Your account has been approved! You can now log in and start using our services.

Please click the link below to log in:
{{ url }}

If you did not request this, please ignore this email or contact support if you have concerns.

download-ready.subject: Your Download is Ready!

invitation.subject: You are invited to join a collection!
invitation.body:
Hello,

You have been invited to join this a collection!

Please click the link below to accept your invitation and get started:
{{ url }}

If you did not expect to receive this invitation, please ignore this email or reach out to our support team for assistance.
